entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight with a few flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 12 March 2023
